value.title: Becoming a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to become a solution architect.

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Create and share your first Power BI report
value.excerpt: With Power BI, you can create compelling visuals and reports. In this module, you learn how to use Power BI Desktop to connect to data, build visuals, and create a report that you can share with others in your organization. You then learn how to publish the report to the Power BI service, so that others can see your insights and benefit from your work.

value.title: Create reports with Power BI and Dataverse for Teams
value.excerpt: Dataverse for Teams - Build your first report with Power BI and Dataverse for Teams.

value.title: Use DAX iterator functions in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you’ll learn about what the family of iterator functions can do and how to use them in your DAX calculations. Calculations will include custom summarizations, ranking, and concatenation.

value.title: Discover customer needs as a Solution Architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to ask customers questions about their business processes and feature requirements to create a viable solution.

value.title: Power Platform - Introduction, business value, and demos
value.excerpt: Explore the capabilities of Power Platform applications, as seen in demonstrations and customer case studies.

value.title: Introduction to foundations in data modeling
value.excerpt: This module introduces the key concepts that are related to developing a well-organized data model.

value.title: Secure, publish, and share data in Power BI
value.excerpt: This module reviews securing, sharing, and publishing Microsoft Power BI reports as part of Power BI service.

value.title: Perform analytics in Power BI for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module provides guidance on how to apply analytics to data to gain greater insight.

value.title: Connect data to Power BI for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module provides the foundational information needed to connect to your data confidently with the new platform.

value.title: Introduction to Power BI for Tableau users
value.excerpt: The purpose of this module is to help Tableau analysts switch from Tableau to Microsoft Power BI.

value.title: Optimize Power BI performance for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module demonstrates how performance can determine a visual's usefulness.

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Create a Power BI Dashboard in 10 Minutes!
value.excerpt: Enjoy my free full course on Udemy https://www.udemy.com/share/102Qqu/ Learn how to quickly create your first dashboard using Microsoft Power BI fast. value.title: Automatic refresh in Power BI desktop - Power BI desktop update October 2019
value.excerpt: In the october power bi desktop update, they released the possibility to have automatic page refresh for direct queries in power bi desktop and the service too.  Here we go through how it works and what you need to watch out for.  Link to the docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/desktop-automatic-page-refresh

value.title: Bulk import data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks #04
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI.  LINK to NFL site: http://www.nfl.com/stats/categorystats?tabSeq=2&offensiveStatisticCategory=TEAM_PASSING&conference=ALL&role=TM&season=2015&seasonType=REG
